subject: Hello dear,
body:
Hello dear,
I am pleased to inform you that a concrete arrangement has been made for
your long-delayed fund to be released any moment from now.
I hope you respond promptly for more details.
Warm regards.
Regards,
Mr Zigman Keny

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Hello Mr. Zigman Keny,

I'm delighted to hear from you! It's quite exciting to know that there are some funds being released. Could you please provide me with more details about this? I'm really curious to know more.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes.

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Dear Mr Christopher,

Your message is well received and firstly I write to apologize for the
delay in responding to you.it is a result of work overload on my desk.

Please note: the amount is $15.5m and with my position, it is crystal clear
we get this fund released to your account but both of us have to have an
understanding by first drafting a memorandum of understanding (MOU) stating
our ratio of sharing at the end of trusting

Therefore you are to send your full contact details and your reachable
telephone so that we can talk more on the phone.

Awaiting your prompt response.

Thanks and have a great day,
Mr. Zigman Keny.

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Hello Mr. Zigman Keny,

Thank you for your prompt response and I understand how work can pile up sometimes. It's quite interesting to hear about this fund release, it sounds like a great opportunity.

However, could you please provide more details about this MOU? What exactly does it entail? And what would be our ratio of sharing?

I'm sorry but I'm not comfortable sharing my contact details at the moment. Can we continue our discussion here?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Dear Mr Christopher,
Good day to you.
Please note that I am using my position as the newly appointed paymaster
general of our apex bank to perfect this transaction with you for our
mutual benefit and I would like you to see it in that regard.

The MOU is our sharing ratio.
40% is for you
60% is for me.

Chris, Note that there are expenses and settlements involved though I have
some funds to expedite action on it. In a couple of days,. The moment I
have your details I will facilitate the MOU and copies will be forwarded to
you for your perusal and endorsement. Thereafter I will work hard to get
the approval of these funds in your name as an investment partner and
copies of the fund's approval will be forwarded to you as well. Please note
that I will present you as the bonafide beneficiary of this fund and
normally you will be required to be physically present to endorse the funds
release transfer documents in the bank as the benefactor.  This will be
done the moment we complete the first process I am here and I will use my
good position and office to make sure that everything is crystal clear.

Please note that upon your arrival to sign off the fund-released documents
the fund will be credited to your account within 24 hours and on
What I mostly needed was that trust that my share of the fund would be
saved in your hand because it is a great opportunity for both of us as I
have the intention to quit office as soon as the fund is in your account so
that I can come over to your country and enter into agriculture farming
that I have passion for..

Thanks and await your response
Mr. Zigman Keny,

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Hello Mr. Zigman Keny,

I hope this message finds you well. I must say, your proposal sounds quite interesting and it's certainly a unique opportunity. However, I do have a few questions that I'd like to clarify before we proceed further.

Firstly, could you please elaborate on the nature of the investment? What exactly does it entail? Also, what kind of expenses are we talking about here?

Secondly, you mentioned an MOU - could you provide more details about this? What would be my responsibilities under this MOU?

Lastly, you mentioned that I would need to be physically present at some point - where exactly would this be? And how long would I need to stay there?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Dear Mr.Christopher,

Special greetings to you and thanks for your understanding.
Now to your question (1) Nature of investment, Yes i would like to use my
share of the fund to go into agricultural investment and real estate in
your country under your management and supervision.

(2) MOU: Its an important agreement as regards our roll , ratio and
investment. it provide avenue for both parties to be on a safe side and
most importantly for both of us before moving forward,so that the non of us
will contraven our agreement by clearly laying out what each party expects
of the other, 60% for me / 40% for you. that will be stated in the mou. it
allows each party to clearly state their objectives and what they expect
from one another on the ratio of 60%/40%.Responsibilities you are to stand
as my investment partner

(3) Yes your physical present is important and you are to stay only two
days for the whole process
 and funds credited to your account.

(4) You will be required to sign off the fund with REGENCY FINANCIAL
SERVICES, AMSTERDAM NETHERLANDS
where i deposited the funds.

i will be glad for you to expedite action so that i can facilitate the MOU.

Thanks and have a great day.your information details is very important at
this point.

Mr. Zigman Keny,

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Hello Mr. Zigman Keny,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's a pleasure to hear from you! I'm intrigued by the idea of investing in real estate and other ventures in my country under your guidance.

I understand that an MOU is crucial for laying out expectations and roles, which sounds like a smart way to ensure both parties are on the same page. However, could you please elaborate more on what exactly will be stated in this MOU? 

Also, I'm curious about the process at REGENCY FINANCIAL SERVICES, STERDAM. What does signing off the fund entail? And why is it necessary for me to be physically present there?

Looking forward to hearing more about this exciting opportunity!

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Dear Mr.Christopher,

Thanks for your prompt response and very sorry for late response.its as a
result of work.
I feel we are almost achieving the goal. Your presence is important because
all the vital approval documents have to be in your name before your trip
to Amsterdam. It is a normal process. Upon your arrival in Amsterdam, the
director of the REGENCY FINANCIAL services will lend you to the bank for
final credit of the fund to your account as the benefactor. Please do note
that the fund is in their vault which will be taken to the bank for
immediate transfer to your mother's account.

Therefore it is a two-day process.
The MOU will state that you are my investment partner and, note all the
documents have to be in your name as the benefactor please do not look down
on me because this is my last hope as I told you earlier that the moment
you are in a position of this fund I will quit my job to meet with you.
Please send your full details so that I can draft  the mou and forward a
copy for your perusal

Mr. Zigman Keny

subject: Mr Christopher
body:
Hello Sir,

Please send your details to enable draft the MOU which copy will be sent to
you for your perusal. More importantly, there is no risk involved because I
used my position to perfect this transaction. The fund is not associated
with any criminal activity.  I know you are a man of high reputation,
likewise, myself therefore feel very free with me as I have a name to
protect and let's get this concluded.
Thanks and await your prompt response.
Mr.Zigman Keny

subject: Re: Mr Christopher
body:
Hello Keny,

Thank you for your message. I'm quite interested in learning more about this opportunity. Could you please provide me with more information about the MOU and the fund? What is it exactly that we're dealing with here?

I appreciate your reassurances regarding the legality of this matter, but could you also explain how you used your position to perfect this? I'm just trying to understand everything clearly.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Hello Mr. Zigman Keny,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's quite interesting to learn about the process involved in this venture. I'm glad to be a part of it, even though I'm still trying to understand everything.

I have a few questions if you don't mind. Could you please explain more about the role of REGENCY FINANCIAL services in this process? And how does the fund transfer from their vault to my mother's account work?

Also, could you clarify what an MOU is and why it needs to be in my name? I'm not very familiar with these terms and processes, so your explanation would be greatly appreciated.

Lastly, you mentioned that all documents need to be in my name as the benefactor. Could you elaborate on what these documents are and their importance?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Hello Mr. Zigman Keny,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's quite interesting to learn about the process and how everything works. I'm glad to be part of this journey with you.

I understand that the MOU will state me as your investment partner, which sounds like a significant role. Could you please elaborate more on what my responsibilities would be in this position? 

Also, I'm curious about the REGENCY FINANCIAL services and their role in this process. How do they assist in transferring the fund?

I appreciate your trust in me and look forward to learning more about this opportunity.

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Dear Mr Christopher,

Good day to you, very sorry for responding late.
Please, I have written and explained to you everything about the
transaction and your role in it.
Clarifications:

(1) You are my investment partner
(2) You are to manage and invest part of my share in real estate.
(3) The said fund  $15.5M will be released to you as my investment partner
(4) Upon receiving this fund 40% is yours and 60% is for me.

All this will be stated clearly in the MOU.
Thanks and waiting for your details

Mr. Zigman Keny

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Hello Mr. Zigman Keny,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your patience and understanding regarding my late response.

Your proposal sounds interesting, but I must admit, I'm not entirely clear on all the details. Could you please elaborate more on what exactly my role would be as your investment partner? 

Also, could you provide more information about the real estate investments we would be making? What kind of properties are we looking at and in which locations?

Lastly, could you explain a bit more about the MOU? What does it entail and how does it protect both our interests?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Hello Mr Christopher.

Good day to you.

Please all this back and forth should stop. You are to handle this
transaction as a mature man that I feel you are.
If you are interested in partnering with me you should adhere to my
directives.
I do not have time to repeat one particular thing.

Therefore if you are still with me and interested in the deal, you better
come out openly, and let's move forward.
The duration of concluding this noble transaction is important to me.
Thanks and have a great day
Mr. Zigman Keny,

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Hello Mr. Zigman Keny,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your straightforwardness and I'm indeed interested in partnering with you. However, could you please provide more details about the deal? What exactly does it entail and what would be my role in it?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Hello Chris,
Your message was well received.
Please note that your role is to receive this fund on my behalf and equally
invest it in a profitable business.
As my investment partner, you are to take your share of the fund and manage
my own 60% pending the time that I will meet you.
You are to receive all the funds.
All this will be explained in the MOU which will be forwarded to you for
your perusal.
Mr. Zigman Keny

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Hello Mr. Zigman Keny,

Thank you for your message and the trust you've placed in me. I'm intrigued by this opportunity, but I would like to understand more about it. Could you please provide more details about the nature of the investment? What kind of business are we talking about here? And what exactly does the MOU entail?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Hello Sir,
Good morning.
Your message was well received., thank you.
Please note that the MOU is an agreement that stipulates your role in the
investment and equally states the ratio of sharing perimeters.
Investment, I would like to invest my share of the fund in real estate.
I feel by now we should have concluded this noble transaction but the way
you are going about it with aa lot of delays from your side is alarming.i
requested your full contact details to draft the MOU and until now we are
still on one sport.
Kindly send it today and let's move on You to read the MOU  very well
before signing.
Thanks
Mr. Zigman Keny,

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Hello Mr. Zigman Keny,

Good morning to you too! I'm glad to hear from you and appreciate your patience with me. I'm just trying to understand everything clearly, as this is a big step for me.

I agree that real estate seems like a promising investment. Could you tell me more about the specific opportunities we're looking at? Are there any particular areas or types of properties that we should focus on?

As for the MOU, I'm eager to read it and understand our agreement better. However, I'm not comfortable sharing my full contact details online due to privacy concerns. Is there another way we can proceed with drafting the MOU?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Hello Sir,
Without your details how can one prepare the agreement tell me if you know
better.?
Thanks
Mr Zigman

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Hello Mr. Zigman,

Thank you for your message. I understand that certain details are necessary to prepare an agreement. However, I am not comfortable sharing personal information online due to privacy concerns. Could you please explain more about the process and what kind of information is typically required? This will help me understand better.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Hello Christopher

The information required is as follows.

(1) YOUR FULL NAMES
(2) YOUR CONTACT ADDRESS
(3) YOUR REACHABLE TELEPHONE NUMBER TO SPEAK  WITH YOU  WHEN NECESSARY.
Thanks
Mr Zigman Keny

subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
Hello Mr. Zigman Keny,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm always excited to meet new people and learn about their experiences. Could you tell me more about why you need this information? I'm a bit confused, but I'm sure there's a good reason behind it.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Christopher
